text: The 1966 UCI Track Cycling World Championships were the World Championship for track cycling. They took place in Frankfurt, West Germany from 29 August to 4 September 1966.World Championship Track Cycling 2014-1893 Eleven events were contested, 9 for men (3 for professionals, 6 for amateurs) and 2 for women. ==Medal summary== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Professional Events |- |Men's sprint | Giuseppe Beghetto || Ron Baensch || Sante Gaiardoni |- | | Leandro Faggin || Ferdinand Bracke || Dieter Kemper |- |Men's motor-paced | Romain De Loof || Ehrenfried Rudolph || Leo Proost |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Amateur Events |- | |Pierre Trentin || Paul Seye || Frans Van Den Ruit |- |Men's sprint | Daniel Morelon || Pierre Trentin || Omar Phakadze |- | | Tiemen Groen || Jiří Daler || Giorgio Ursi |- |Men's team pursuit | Cipriano Chemello Antonio Castello Luigi Roncaglia Gino Pancini || Karl-Heinz Henrichs Herbert Honz Jürgen Kissner Karl Link || Viktor Bykov Mikhail Kolyuschev Stanislav Moskvin Leonid Vukolov |- |Men's motor-paced |Piet De Wit || Bert Romyn || Christian Giscos |- |Men's tandem | Daniel Morelon Pierre Trentin || Klaus Kobusch Martin Stenzel || Walter Gorini Giordano Turrini |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Women's Events |- |Women's sprint |Irina Kiritchenko |Valentina Savina |Heidi Blobner |- |Women's individual pursuit |Beryl Burton |Yvonne Reynders |Hannelore Mattig |} ==Medal table== ==See also== * 1966 UCI Road World Championships ==References== ==External links== * Track cycling Category:UCI Track Cycling World Championships by year Category:International cycle races hosted by Germany Category:Sports competitions in Frankfurt Category:1966 in track cycling Category:1960s in Frankfurt
title: 1966 UCI Track Cycling World Championships
